title: Who is Mr. Quick? ////// 99
description:
Who is Mr. Quick? ////// 99

TrueCrimeGarage.com

Born Sture Bergwall, Thomas Quick was a chosen name. This man was also known as the Sater Man and Sweden's worst serial killer. He has been convicted of unspeakable crimes. He has confessed to stabbings, stranglings, rape, incest and cannibalism. But his confessions told us little about Thomas Quick and even less about Sture Bergwall. Tonight we review the confessions and the crimes and ask an important question. Who is Mr. Quick?

Beer of the week - Necron 99 by 3 Floyds Brewing CompanyGarage Grade - 4 and 1/4 bottle caps out of 5

Beer Fund: https://truecrimegarage.com/home
author: truecrimegarage@gmail.com (TRUE CRIME GARAGE)
